entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon is introduced as a character who roars at Aunt Petunia to let go of the letter. He warns her not to touch it, saying it could be dangerous.

entities.name: aunt petunia
entities.description: Aunt Petunia is introduced as a character who receives a mysterious letter addressed to her. She is described as being in a shaking voice and looking wildly around the kitchen.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is introduced as a character who urges Aunt Petunia to open the letter, saying it will happen anyway.

entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Dudley is mentioned as being present in the kitchen with Aunt Petunia and Uncle Vernon.

entities.name: privet drive
entities.description: Privet Drive is mentioned as the address on the letter addressed to Aunt Petunia.

relationships.description: Uncle Vernon warns Aunt Petunia not to touch the letter, saying it could be dangerous.
Harry urges Aunt Petunia to open the letter, saying it will happen anyway.
